article_title: Was the California Teacher Tenure Decision Judicial Activism?
article_text:
Don’t have time to read the Washington Post or New York Times? Then get The Morning Bell, an early morning edition of the day’s most important political news, conservative commentary and original reporting from a team committed to following the truth no matter where it leads.

Email address

article_metadata.description: This week, Judge Rolf Treu struck down five state laws governing teacher tenure, layoffs and dismissals as unconstitutional. Was his decision correct?
